ch.pschatzmann.jflightcontroller4pi.parameters

Class ParameterStore

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.pschatzmann.jflightcontroller4pi.parameters.ParameterStore

  • public class ParameterStore
extends java.lang.Object
    Functionality to store and retrieve the parameter values. The ParameterValues are held in a fixed array which provides fast access and we make sure that after the data structure has been initialized there the memory requirements are fixed.
    Author:
    pschatzmann
